name: Adtopsy
tag_list: advertising, social-ads, social-media, top-ads, best-ads, ads-chart--ads-clinic, social-ad-wrapper, tc50-demopit09
overview:
Adtopsy is a Social Ranking system for Ads. The platform provide a set of tools that help to rank any ads whether itâ€™s from Google Ads, Yahoo Ads, AdBrite and also works best with self-served Ads on your website. There are three main components in Adtopsy, and these are:

  • Social Ad Wrapper
  • Top Ads Chart (Social Ranking for Ads)
  • Ads Clinic

The Social Ad Wrapper is a free widget which can be embedded or wrap around ads on any websites. Ads that are being wrapped with Social Ad Wrapper will instantly pimped up with social features such as comments, ratings, feedback from social media e.g. Related Tweets on Ads from Twitter. The Social Ad Wrapper instantly allows normal users to view feedback from other users regards to their thoughts on the products, services or the company behind the ads. This instantly provides useful community insights so that users can make better decisions on ads.

The Social Ad Wrapper also helps advertisers and publishers. For advertisers, Adtopsy instantly becomes a value added service that helps to make their ads richer, more social and friendlier. Advertisers also stand the chance to get their ads to become more viral with other users interacting and sharing their thoughts on social media such as Facebook and Twitter. The Social Ad Wrapper has these nifty features that make sharing your thoughts on ads more fun and easy to do.

Furthermore, ads that are outstanding get voted up to the daily/weekly Top Ads Chart on Adtopsy.com â€“ this would mean more free traffic to the advertiser. For publishers, itâ€™s about getting your ads to become more clickable, so you can generate more revenue, and Adtopsy helps you do that. The Social Ad Wrapper highlights your ads and helps you engage your users to check out interesting feedback on ads. Itâ€™s easy, just wrap your ads with a free Social Ad Wrapper, and enjoy increased effectiveness on your ads instantly!

So while popular ads get voted up and bad ones get booted down, Adtopsy.com becomes a creative destination for ads. It will attract a niche crowd namely industries in advertising, marketing and etc. However it can also be a destination for users who are looking for best deals being advertised. This would mean searching for deals advertised by your favourite brands could be done with Adtopsy. Then, you could read comments and ratings being shared by other users to help you in making your decision. In a nutshell, Adtopsy is here to help.
